text: श्रीगुरु चरन सरोज रज, निज मन मुकुर सुधारि।
answer: I bow to my teacher’s feet and clean my mind like a mirror.
notes: Before learning, we calm our mind so wisdom can shine.

text: जय हनुमान ज्ञान गुण सागर। जय कपीस तिहु लोक उजागर॥
answer: Hail Hanuman, ocean of wisdom and good qualities, shining across the world.
notes: Knowledge and kindness make you bright wherever you go.

text: राम दूत अतुलित बल धामा। अंजनि पुत्र पवनसुत नामा॥
answer: Messenger of Ram, unmatched in strength, son of Anjani and the Wind.
notes: Real strength is used in service of others.

text: महाबीर बिक्रम बजरंगी। कुमति निवार सुमति के संगी॥
answer: Great and brave Hanuman removes bad thoughts and brings good ones.
notes: Keep good company, it shapes your mind.

text: कंचन बरन बिराज सुबेसा। कानन कुंडल कुंचित केसा॥
answer: Golden colored, wearing fine clothes, earrings, and curly hair.
notes: Strength and beauty come from purity inside.

text: हाथ बज्र और ध्वजा बिराजे। कांधे मूंज जनेऊ साजे॥
answer: He holds a thunderbolt and flag, with sacred thread on his shoulder.
notes: Symbols remind us of duty and courage.

text: शंकर सुवन केसरी नंदन। तेज प्रताप महा जग बंदन॥
answer: Son of Shiva and Kesari, his power is worshipped everywhere.
notes: Energy and devotion make one truly powerful.

text: विद्यावान गुनी अति चातुर। राम काज करिबे को आतुर॥
answer: Wise, skilled, clever, and eager to serve Ram.
notes: Eagerness to help is the highest intelligence.

text: प्रभु चरित्र सुनिबे को रसिया। राम लखन सीता मन बसिया॥
answer: He loves listening to Ram’s stories and holds Ram, Lakshman, and Sita in his heart.
notes: Loving good stories fills the heart with joy.

text: सूक्ष्म रूप धरि सियहि दिखावा। बिकट रूप धरि लंक जरावा॥
answer: He took a tiny form to meet Sita and a giant form to burn Lanka.
notes: Adapt yourself — gentle when needed, strong when required.

text: भीम रूप धरि असुर संहारे। रामचंद्र के काज संवारे॥
answer: He took a fierce form to defeat demons and help Ram’s mission.
notes: Courage protects the good.

text: लाय संजीवन लखन जियाये। श्रीरघुबीर हरषि उर लाये॥
answer: He brought the healing herb to save Lakshman, making Ram very happy.
notes: Helping others in need is the greatest service.

text: रघुपति कीन्ही बहुत बड़ाई। तुम मम प्रिय भरत सम भाई॥
answer: Ram praised Hanuman, saying you are as dear as my brother Bharat.
notes: True devotion earns love and respect.

text: सहस बदन तुम्हरो जस गावैं। अस कहि श्रीपति कंठ लगावैं॥
answer: Thousands sing of Hanuman’s glory, and Ram embraced him.
notes: Good deeds spread far and bring love.

text: सनकादिक ब्रह्मादि मुनीसा। नारद सारद सहित अहीसा॥
answer: Sages, gods, and even the serpent-king sing your praises.
notes: Wisdom is respected by all, even the wise.

text: जम कुबेर दिगपाल जहां ते। कवि कोविद कहि सके कहां ते॥
answer: Even gods like Yamraj, Kuber, poets, and scholars cannot fully describe you.
notes: True greatness goes beyond words.

text: तुम उपकार सुग्रीवहि कीन्हा। राम मिलाय राज पद दीन्हा॥
answer: You helped Sugriva meet Ram and regain his kingdom.
notes: Helping others find their path is noble.

text: तुम्हरो मंत्र बिभीषन माना। लंकेस्वर भए सब जग जाना॥
answer: Vibhishan followed your advice and became king of Lanka.
notes: Wise advice can change lives.

text: जुग सहस्र जोजन पर भानू। लील्यो ताहि मधुर फल जानू॥
answer: As a child, you leapt to the sun, thinking it was a sweet fruit.
notes: Curiosity and courage are natural strengths.

text: प्रभु मुद्रिका मेलि मुख माहीं। जलधि लांघि गये अचरज नाहीं॥
answer: With Ram’s ring in your mouth, you crossed the ocean easily.
notes: Faith makes impossible tasks possible.

text: दुर्गम काज जगत के जेते। सुगम अनुग्रह तुम्हरे तेते॥
answer: Difficult tasks become easy with your grace.
notes: Courage and faith turn mountains into molehills.

text: राम दुआरे तुम रखवारे। होत न आज्ञा बिनु पैसारे॥
answer: You guard Ram’s door; no one enters without your permission.
notes: Discipline and loyalty guard values.

text: सब सुख लहि तुम्हारी सरना। तुम रक्षक काहू को डरना॥
answer: All joy comes by taking shelter in you. With you as protector, none need fear.
notes: True faith removes fear.

text: आपन तेज सम्हारो आपै। तीनों लोक हांक ते कांपै॥
answer: Even when you hold back your power, the three worlds tremble.
notes: Greatness lies in self-control.

text: भूत पिशाच निकट नहिं आवै। महाबीर जब नाम सुनावै॥
answer: Ghosts and fears vanish when Hanuman’s name is heard.
notes: Faith brings courage against fear.

text: नासै रोग हरै सब पीरा। जपत निरंतर हनुमत बीरा॥
answer: Chanting Hanuman’s name removes illness and sorrow.
notes: Positive thoughts heal the heart and body.

text: संकट तें हनुमान छुड़ावै। मन क्रम बचन ध्यान जो लावै॥
answer: Hanuman frees from troubles if remembered with heart, actions, and words.
notes: Consistency in prayer builds inner strength.

text: सब पर राम तपस्वी राजा। तिन के काज सकल तुम साजा॥
answer: You fulfill all tasks of Ram, the noble king.
notes: Serving the right leader makes actions meaningful.

text: और मनोरथ जो कोई लावै। सोई अमित जीवन फल पावै॥
answer: Whoever comes with wishes gets lasting joy through you.
notes: True joy is deeper than quick rewards.

text: चारों जुग परताप तुम्हारा। है परसिद्ध जगत उजियारा॥
answer: Your glory shines in all four ages, lighting the world.
notes: Goodness is timeless.

text: साधु संत के तुम रखवारे। असुर निकंदन राम दुलारे॥
answer: You protect saints and defeat demons, beloved of Ram.
notes: Stand by goodness, oppose injustice.

text: अष्ट सिद्धि नव निधि के दाता। अस बर दीन जानकी माता॥
answer: Sita blessed you to grant eight powers and nine treasures.
notes: Blessings come from humility and devotion.

text: राम रसायन तुम्हरे पासा। सदा रहो रघुपति के दासा॥
answer: You hold Ram’s nectar and stay forever his servant.
notes: Serving good keeps you pure and happy.

text: तुम्हरे भजन राम को पावै। जनम जनम के दुख बिसरावै॥
answer: Through devotion to you, one finds Ram and forgets sorrows.
notes: Devotion uplifts across lifetimes.

text: अन्तकाल रघुबर पुर जाई। जहाँ जन्म हरिभक्त कहाई॥
answer: At life’s end, one reaches Ram’s abode, reborn as his devotee.
notes: Faith brings peace at life’s journey end.

text: और देवता चित्त न धरई। हनुमत सेइ सर्ब सुख करई॥
answer: Worshipping you brings all happiness, no need to seek other gods.
notes: Focus on one path brings clarity.

text: संकट कटै मिटै सब पीरा। जो सुमिरै हनुमत बलबीरा॥
answer: Troubles and pain end for those who remember mighty Hanuman.
notes: Remembering strength gives strength.

text: जय जय जय हनुमान गोसाईं। कृपा करहु गुरुदेव की नाईं॥
answer: Victory to you, Hanuman! Be as kind as a great teacher.
notes: A guide’s kindness shapes the student.

text: जो सत बार पाठ कर कोई। छूटहि बंदि महा सुख होई॥
answer: Whoever reads this 100 times is freed from bonds and gains joy.
notes: Repetition makes values sink deep.

text: जो यह पढ़ै हनुमान चालीसा। होय सिद्धि साखी गौरीसा॥
answer: Reading this Hanuman Chalisa brings success, with Shiva as witness.
notes: Faith and effort together bring success.

text: तुलसीदास सदा हरि चेरा। कीजै नाथ हृदय मह डेरा॥
answer: Tulsidas says: I am always servant of God, please live in my heart.
notes: Humility keeps love of God inside forever.
